text:
You shall know that I am the LORD, when I open your graves and make you come up out of them, my people! I will put my spirit in you that you may come to life, and I will settle you in your land. Then you shall know that I am the LORD. I have spoken; I will do it

Ezekiel 37:13-14

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
